Description:
Detects execution of "certmgr" with the "add" flag in order to install a new certificate on the system.
Adversaries may install a root certificate on a compromised system to avoid warnings when connecting to adversary controlled web servers.


Author: oscd.community, @redcanary, Zach Stanford @svch0st
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New Root Certificate Installed Via CertMgr.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\certmgr.exe' and original_file_name = 'certmgt.exe') and (command like '%/add%' and command like '%root%'))
